name: Irish Car Rentals
description: Irish Car Rentals the franchisee for Europcar Car Rental in Ireland. We have been in the car rental business for more than 25 years and have grown to become one of the leading online car rental providers in Ireland. Europcar supplies the cars to Irish Car Rentals. Irish Car Rentals is proud to be a partner of some of the leading travel organisations and websites in the country. With now have over 500 affiliate partners ranging from large companies to single hotel and B&B websites. If you would like to become an affiliate partner of our online car rental programme please apply here.
address: 35 Northwood Court, Northwood Business Park, Santry, Dublin 9, Ireland
